name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in value-engineering and consulting, delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in SaaS solutions and value-based selling, leveraging analytical skills and innovative business processes. Demonstrated ability in project management and cross-functional collaboration to enhance operational efficiency.
Technical expertise includes a robust tech stack: **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, with hands-on experience in developing AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and automation. Adept at deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices and event-driven architectures, and establishing CI/CD pipelines.
Well-versed in compliance-driven development aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, with a strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
